summary: double damage to enemies and by enemies
descriptionHtml:
the \"master\" difficulty setting is now:

double damage by enemies
&
double damage to enemies

creating faster battles (both you and enemies do double damage)








Skyrim difficulty works by altering how much damage both you and enemies do.

(normal:         enemies 1.0x  ,  you 1.0x)  on normal, both you and enemies do 1x damage
(very hard:     enemies 2.0x  ,  you 0.5x) on \"master\", enemies do double damage, you do half
(very easy:     enemies 0.5x  ,  you 2.0x) on the easiest, enemies do half, you do double damage.



this mod simply changes \"master\" to:
(enemies 2.0 ,  you 2.0 )



Request by RedKool8

\"apprentice\" version requested by:  ssk12robin





be sure to check out my other game-balancing mods.
author: jmanoray
